info.name: Alivar Arca Bed
info.description: Geometric and essential, this bed is ideal for a sober and elegant bedroom. "Arca" comes with a wooden headboard, covered with polyurethane and Dacron with a layer of memory foam, characterized by the crafting of stitching that re-creates a pleasant Capitonn√© effect. Available in leather and fabric, the "Arca" bed is finalized with varnished steel legs. Each model comes complete with slatted beech.
